attributes.action: immediately appoint to the House of Lords, Mr John Wick and Mr Henry Gewanter, for services to the protection of the taxpayer against embezzler and fraudster occupants of seats in the House of Commons, and further appoint them to be the House of Commons Fees Office Review Committee Joint Chairmen, for life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These two men have done more to improve the lot of the public of this country than the whole of Nu-Labour have achieved over their 12 years in office during which time they have themselves lorded over profligate and illegal use of taxpayer pounds on all sides while espousing that they are 'sorting it out'.  These two heroes need to be rewarded and need to be rewarded NOW.
